verses.verse: וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> Now the Philistines נִלְחֲמ֣וּ <WH3898> fought בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> against Israel וַיָּ֑נָס <WH5127> fled אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> and the men יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> from before פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> the Philistines וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <WH5307> and fell down חֲלָלִ֖ים <WH2491> slain בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> in mount גִּלְבֹּֽעַ׃ <WH1533> Gilboa

וַיַּדְבְּק֣וּ <WH1692> followed hard פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> And the Philistines אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> Saul וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> and after בָנָ֑יו <WH1121> his sons וַיַּכּ֣וּ <WH5221> slew פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> and the Philistines אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹנָתָ֧ן <WH3129> Jonathan וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִינָדָ֛ב <WH41> and Abinadab וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַלְכִּי־ שׁ֖וּעַ <WH4444> and Malchishua בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> of Saul

וַתִּכְבַּ֤ד <WH3513> went sore הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> And the battle עַל־ <WH5921> against שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> against Saul וַיִּמְצָאֻ֖הוּ <WH4672> hit הַמּוֹרִ֣ים <WH3384> of the archers בַּקָּ֑שֶׁת <WH7198> arch וַיָּ֖חֶל <WH2342> him and he was wounded מִן־ <WH4480> by הַיּוֹרִֽים׃ <WH3384> the archers

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said שָׁאוּל֩ <WH7586> Saul אֶל־ <WH413> about נֹשֵׂ֨א <WH5375> bearer כֵלָ֜יו <WH3627> to his armor שְׁלֹ֥ף <WH8025> Draw חַרְבְּךָ֣ ׀ <WH2719> thy sword וְדָקְרֵ֣נִי <WH1856> and thrust בָ֗הּ פֶּן־ <WH6435> otherwise יָבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> come הָעֲרֵלִ֤ים <WH6189> me through therewith lest these uncircumcised הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these וְהִתְעַלְּלוּ־ <WH5953> and abuse בִ֔י וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not אָבָה֙ <WH14> would נֹשֵׂ֣א <WH5375> bearer כֵלָ֔יו <WH3627> his armor כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יָרֵ֖א <WH3372> afraid מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> not for he was sore ס וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> took שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> So Saul אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> a sword וַיִּפֹּ֖ל <WH5307> and fell עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> and

וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> saw נֹשֵֽׂא־ <WH5375> bearer כֵלָ֖יו <WH3627> his armor כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מֵ֣ת <WH4191> was dead שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> that Saul וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> he fell גַּם־ <WH1571> likewise ה֛וּא <WH1931> he עַל־ <WH5921> on הַחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> likewise on the sword וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> and died ס

וַיָּ֤מָת <WH4191> died שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> So Saul וּשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> and his three בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> sons וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּית֖וֹ <WH1004> and all his house יַחְדָּ֥ו <WH3162> together מֵֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> died

וַ֠יִּרְאוּ <WH7200> saw כָּל־ <WH3605> all אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> And when all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּעֵ֙מֶק֙ <WH6010> that [were] in the valley כִּ֣י <WH3588> for נָ֔סוּ <WH5127> that they fled וְכִי־ <WH3588> for מֵ֖תוּ <WH4191> were dead שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> and that Saul וּבָנָ֑יו <WH1121> and his sons וַיַּעַזְב֤וּ <WH5800> then they forsook עָרֵיהֶם֙ <WH5892> their cities וַיָּנֻ֔סוּ <WH5127> and fled וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> came פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> and the Philistines וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> and dwelt בָּהֶֽם׃ ס

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <WH4283> And it came to pass on the morrow וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> came פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> when the Philistines לְפַשֵּׁ֖ט <WH6584> to strip אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽחֲלָלִ֑ים <WH2491> the slain וַֽיִּמְצְא֤וּ <WH4672> that they found אֶת־ <WH853> שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> Saul וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> and his sons נֹפְלִ֖ים <WH5307> fallen בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> in mount גִּלְבֹּֽעַ׃ <WH1533> Gilboa

וַיַּ֨פְשִׁיטֻ֔הוּ <WH6584> And when they had stripped וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> him they took אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <WH7218> his head וְאֶת־ <WH853> כֵּלָ֑יו <WH3627> and his armour וַיְשַׁלְּח֨וּ <WH7971> and sent בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> into the land פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <WH6430> of the Philistines סָבִ֗יב <WH5439> round about לְבַשֵּׂ֛ר <WH1319> to carry tidings אֶת־ <WH853> עֲצַבֵּיהֶ֖ם <WH6091> unto their idols וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> and to the people

וַיָּשִׂ֙ימוּ֙ <WH7760> And they put אֶת־ <WH853> כֵּלָ֔יו <WH3627> his armour בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> in the house אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> of their gods וְאֶת־ <WH853> גֻּלְגָּלְתּ֥וֹ <WH1538> his head תָקְע֖וּ <WH8628> and fastened בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> in the temple דָּגֽוֹן׃ <WH1712> of Dagon ס

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> heard כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יָבֵ֣ישׁ <WH3003> Jobesh גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> Gilead אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> had done פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> all that the Philistines לְשָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> to Saul

וַיָּקוּמוּ֮ <WH6965> They arose כָּל־ <WH3605> all אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> men חַיִל֒ <WH2428> all the valiant וַיִּשְׂא֞וּ <WH5375> and took away אֶת־ <WH853> גּוּפַ֣ת <WH1480> the body שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> of Saul וְאֵת֙ <WH853> גּוּפֹ֣ת <WH1480> and the bodies בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> of his sons וַיְבִיא֖וּם <WH935> and brought יָבֵ֑ישָׁה <WH3003> them to Jabesh וַיִּקְבְּר֨וּ <WH6912> and buried אֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמוֹתֵיהֶ֜ם <WH6106> their bones תַּ֤חַת <WH8478> under הָאֵלָה֙ <WH424> under the oak בְּיָבֵ֔שׁ <WH3003> in Jabesh וַיָּצ֖וּמוּ <WH6684> and fasted שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> seven יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> died שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> So Saul בְּמַֽעֲלוֹ֙ <WH4603> which he committed אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which מָעַ֣ל <WH4604> for his transgression בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> against the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> because דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> [even] against the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁמָ֑ר <WH8104> which he kept וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also לִשְׁא֥וֹל <WH7592> not and also for asking בָּא֖וֹב <WH178> [counsel] of [one that had] a familiar spirit לִדְרֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH1875> to enquire

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and did not דָרַ֥שׁ <WH1875> And enquired בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> not of the LORD וַיְמִיתֵ֑הוּ <WH4191> therefore he slew וַיַּסֵּב֙ <WH5437> him and turned אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּלוּכָ֔ה <WH4410> the kingdom לְדָוִ֖יד <WH1732> unto David בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יִשָֽׁי׃ <WH3448> of Jesse פ
